flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: After building a Meeblip Synth I felt that I needed a better way of playing it. This project is the result.
guide.introduction_rendered: After building a Meeblip Synth I felt that I needed a better way of playing it. This project is the result.
guide.summary: After following this guide you will have a DIY midi wind controller.
guide.title: Digital Saxophone
